price: Salaatowwan irratti,tikfadhaa keessattuu salaatattii giddu galeessaa irratti. Haala Rabbiif ajajamoo taataniin dhaabbadhaa.
arabic: حَٰفِظُواْ عَلَى ٱلصَّلَوَٰتِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ٱلۡوُسۡطَىٰ وَقُومُواْ لِلَّهِ قَٰنِتِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: ḥāfiẓū ʿalā al-ṣalawāti wal-ṣalati al-wus'ṭā waqūmū lillahi qānitīna
